bibl.title: Visual Aspects of Performance in Bacchylides' Epinician Odes.
bibl.note: 1. The performed ode as monument (ἄγαλμα). - 2. The performed ode as a result of friendship and hospitality. - 3. Performance in the place of the games. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Margarita Sotiriou, Visual Aspects of Performance in Bacchylides' Epinician Odes.
